2.「いや <pc>だったか……。| おどろかせて すまなかった。| だが いいとこ: No, it was <pc>. Sorry for|scaring you. But you're in the right place.

As a matter of fact, the village king, Cliff|Gaen, went to the snowy mountains in search|of a late returning villager and never came|
|back.

4.「ちがったか……。お前は 旅の者だな。| ふむ。<pc>というのか。: I guess not. You're a traveler. You're a|traveler's <pc> and...

5.「じつは このランガーオ村の村王である| クリフゲーンさまが 帰りの遅い村人を探:
As a matter of fact, the village king of|Langgao, Lord Cliff Gaeng, went to the snowy|mountains to look for a villager who was|
|late returning home and never came back.

6.「村王は お父さんを 探しにいったの！: The Village King went looking for his|father!

7.「お父さんが帰ってこないのって 私が言ったら| すぐに連れ戻してくるから お前は: I said, "Your father isn't coming home," and|he said, "I'll bring him right back, and you|can wait and not worry.

8.「村の者が 雪山から戻らないときに| 村王が捜索に行くのは よくあることだが|:
It's not uncommon for the village king to go|searching for the villagers when they don't|return from the snowy mountains, but never|
|before has he returned so late.

11.「お父さんは 今日は| ラギ雪原の方に行くって 言ってました。| 町で売れる素材: Dad said we're going to the Lagi snowfield|today. He said he's going to gather|materials to sell in town.

12.「村王にも そう伝えたから| そっちの方に行けば| きっと ふたりに 会えるはず: I told the village king that, so I'm sure|you'll find them there!

13.「ラギ雪原は ランガーオ山地の東端から| 北へ抜けた所にある 厳しい雪原だ。|: The Lagi snowfield is just north of the|eastern edge of the Langao Mountains. If you|go there, take this.

15.「それは 雪山で体力をうばわれぬよう| 身体を あたためるための 薬草の一種だ。: It is a herb to warm the body so as not to|lose strength in the snowy mountains.

16.「もしも 村王や フウミの父親が| 寒さで弱っていたら それを食べさせてくれ。|: If the village king or Fumi's father was|weak from the cold, he would be fed. Please|do me a favor.

17.「<pc>さん！ お父さんと| 村王のことを よろしくお願いします！: <pc>! Please give my regards to|your father and the Village King!

18.「おおっ 恩に着るぞ……と言いたいところだが| どうやら 今は 頼まれごとが|: Oh, I owe you... I'd say I owe you, but it|looks like you've got a lot of favors to do|right now.

19.「無理強いはできんが こちらも急を要する。| できるなら 手を空けてきて| 私の: I can't force you to do something, but it's|urgent. If you can spare a moment, do me a|favor and do me a favor.

20.「そ そうか……。| こうなったら 村王が 無事に戻られることを| 天に祈るより: Oh, yeah. We'll just have to pray to Heaven|for the Village King's safe return.

22.「もう一度 頼もう。| 村王が 帰りの遅い村人を探しに| 雪山に行ったまま 戻っ: Once more . The village king went to the|snowy mountains to look for the late|villagers and never came back.

23.「村の者が 雪山から戻らないときに| 村王が捜索に行くのは よくあることだが|:
It's not uncommon for the village king to go|searching for the villagers when they don't|return from the snowy mountains, but never|
|before has he returned so late.

25.「おお <pc>！| 村王と フウミの父親は 見つかったのか！？: Oh, <pc>! Did you find the|Village King and Fumi's father?

26.「そうか。まだか……。| いや 急かして すまない。: . Not yet. No, you rushed me.

27.「村王と フウミの父親は| ラギ雪原の方に 向かったと思われる。| そちらを 重: I think the village king and Fumi's father|went towards the Lagi snowfield. Let's focus|our search there.

28.「頼りは お前だけなのだ。| よろしく頼むぞ。: You're my only hope. Pleased to meet you.

29.「<pc>さん！ お父さんと| 村王のことを よろしくお願いします！: <pc>! Please give my regards to|your father and the Village King!

33.「……目を覚ませ クーガ。| どうやら 神さまは まだ| わしらを 死なせてくれ: ... Wake up. It seems that God hasn't let us|die yet.

34.「いかんな……。寒さで 意識を| 失ってしまっている。何か 身体を| あたためる: I don't know. The cold made him lose|consciousness. I wish I had something to|warm me up.

36.「お前は 村から来たのだろう？| だったら ランガーオ村の者から| 何か あずか: You are from the village, aren't you? If|that's the case, have you received anything|from the villagers of Langao?

37.<pc>は 村王クリフゲーンに|ヌーク草を 渡した。: <pc> is the Village King|Cliffgene with the Nukeweed .

38.「おお ヌーク草を持ってきてくれたか！| よし！ これさえあれば！: Oh, you brought the Nuke weed! All right! If|only I had this!

42.「さすが 効果絶大だな。| よし わしも ひとクチいただこう。: Very effective. All right, I'll take a bite.

43.「いやあ ありがとうございました。| おかげで 血が沸き立つくらい| 全身ポカポ: Thank you very much. You made my blood boil|and my whole body warm. Now we can go back|to the village!

44.「村王も ありがとうございました。| もし 村王が岩陰に運んでくれなかったら|:
Thank you, too, King of the Village. If the|village king hadn't carried me behind the|rock, I might be freezing to death right|
|now.

45.「ガハハ！ わしに 礼はいらん！| わしも 寒さに体力をうばわれて| ここまで運: Gahaha! You don't have to thank me! I, too,|was so cold that I had to carry it all the|way up here.

46.「ヌーク草も持たずに 雪山に来るとは| わしも うかつだったわ。| いや それよ: I'm not the one who came to the snowy|mountains without nuke weed. No, it's more|like...

47.「この わしが 雪山で動けなくなる日が| 来るとはな……。: I never thought the day would come when I|would be stuck in the snow.

48.「いやいや。そんなこと言ってる場合ではない。| ヌーク草の 効果が切れる前に|: I don't know. I don't have time for this.|We'd better get back to the village before|the nukeweed wears off!

49.「ガハハ！ <pc>よ！| お前には 礼をせねばな！| 村に戻ったら わしの家ま: Gahaha! <pc>! I have you to|thank for that! When you get back to the|village, come to my house!

50.「おっ <pc> 戻ったか！| ガハハ！ 待っていたぞ！: Whoa, <pc>, you're back!|Gahaha! We've been waiting for you!

51.「お前が 村に来てくれて 助かった！| もし お前が いなかったらと思うと| ぞ: Thank God you came to the village! I shudder|to think what it would be like if you|weren't here! Gahahaha!

52.「<pc>さん ありがとうございました。| おかげで お父さんも 村王も| 無事: Thank you, <pc>. Thanks to you,|your father and the village king will return|safely.

54.「まあ みんな無事で なによりだ！| そうだ ギュラン。忘れないうちに| あれを: Well, I'm glad you're all safe! That's|right, Guy. Give it to <pc>|before I forget.
